title: Black suns in gold: an essay about chaos, art, and life

history.message:
Hi thiago,

Thank you for your interest in The Decadent Review. We have received your submission and look forward to reviewing it.

Thanks!
-The Decadent Review

Dear Thiago,

Thank you for this essay. It's an interesting read, and, with a bit of editing, would fit well in The Decadent Review.

We're a bit slower than usual nowadays, so please allow some time until we get a draft going.

We'll send an email as it registered to Submittable (sometimes those end up in the junk folder, so check that, just in case).


Thank you,


D.

Dear thiago alves,

Congratulations! This message confirms the acceptance of your submission to The Decadent Review.

Thanks again.
Sincerely,
Dimitri Kaufman
The Decadent Review

Dear Dimitri Kaufman,


I thank you very much to accept my essay.

I understand, it isn't a quick process. Awaiting any advice or demand of editing.

Once more, appreciated it.


With best regards,

thiago
